ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
des: "Orange juice, bourbon and lemon-lime soda are stirred together in this quick, easy, and quite tasty punch.  I have never had a complaint about this one."
ins: In a punch bowl or other large container, combine the orange juice concentrate, whiskey and lemon-lime soda. Stir until mixed, then throw in some ice before serving.
